resources.string: "Contacts permissions are needed for providing email completions."

This demonstration shows how Eddystone-EID can be used for location-based two-factor authentication.

This application uses student identification numbers to check with Google's Proximity Beacon API and shows whether or not the user is found.

This shows that resources can be set to only be accessed when entering a certain location.

Sample student IDs linked to this project: 

Saxon: 12345678 
Mario: 87654321 
Administrator: 00000000
